alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 10:04PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON... SOUTHERN LEWIS AND NORTHEASTERN OSWEGO COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1001 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Central Square to Ohio. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Heavy downpours and wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Redfield, Highmarket, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Richland, Martinsburg, Williamstown, Lyonsdale, Greig, Orwell, Lorraine, Port Leyden, Lyons Falls, Altmar, Constableville, Turin, Worth, Osceola, Amboy Center, West Leyden, and Rector. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
